main event: A large bright object followed by a small bright light was observed in Atlanta, Georgia, on October 2, 1954.
interesting points: The large bright object was accompanied by a small bright light,The small light eventually caught up to the large object,Two jets were seen in formation directing towards the large object,The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes,The object was noted for its erratic motion and brightness.
sighted object: large bright object and a small bright light
witness description: Various observers at location, including civilians
